titles.title: When the Roll Is Called Up Yonder

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
When the roll
is called up yonder,
When the roll
is called up yonder,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
When the roll
is called up yonder,
When the roll
is called up yonder,
I’ll be there.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
When the trumpet
of the Lord shall sound,
and time shall be no more,
And the morning breaks,
eternal, bright and fair;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
When the saved of earth
shall gather over on the other shore,
And the roll
is called up yonder,
I’ll be there.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
On that bright
and cloudless morning
when the dead
in Christ shall rise,
And the glory
of His resurrection share;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When His chosen ones
shall gather to their home
beyond the skies,
And the roll
is called up yonder,
I’ll be there

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let us labor for the Master from the dawn
till setting sun,
Let us talk
of all His wondrous
love and care;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Then when all of life
is over,
and our work on earth
is done,
And the roll
is called up yonder,
I’ll be there
